state Module¶

class state.BaseMDState(domain, potential, particle_pos_init=None, particle_vel_init=None, N=0, mass=1.0, dt=1e-05, T=0.02)[source]¶

Base molecular dynamics class.

arg domain:(Domain class) Container within which the simulation takes place.
arg potential:(Potential class) Potential to use between particles.
arg particle_pos_init:
 (class PosInit*) Class to initialise particles with.
arg particle_vel_init:
 (class VelInit*) Class to initialise particles velocities with.
arg N:(integer) Number of particles, default 1.
arg mass:(float) Mass of particles, default 1.0
arg dt:(float) Time-step size.
arg T:(float) End time.
N()¶

Returns number of particles.

accelerations()[source]¶

Return all particle accelerations.

cell_sort_all()¶

Construct neighbour list, assigning atoms to cells. Using Rapaport alg.

domain()¶

Return the domain used by the state.

energy_kenetic()[source]¶

Calcluate and return kenetic energy.

frame_plot_energy()¶

Function to plot all particles in 3D scatter plot.

frame_plot_pos()¶

Function to plot all particles in 3D scatter plot.

isnan_checker(r_in, msg)¶
pair_locate()¶

Loop over all cells update accelerations and potential engery.

pair_locate_c()¶

C version of the pair_locate: Loop over all cells update accelerations and potential engery.

positions()[source]¶

Return all particle positions.

velocities()[source]¶

Return all particle velocities.

velocity_verlet_integration()¶

Perform Velocity Verlet integration up to time T.

velocity_verlet_step()¶

Perform one step of Velocity Verlet.

class state.PosInitLatticeNRho(N, rho)¶

Arrange N particles into a 3D lattice of density /rho. Redfines container volume as a cube with deduced volume, assumes unit mass.

Arg :(int) input, N, number of particles.
Arg :(float) input, /rho, required density.
reset(state_input)¶

Applies initial lattice to particle positions.

Arg :(state.*) object of state class. Inheritered from BaseMDState.
class state.PosInitLatticeNRhoRand(N, rho, dev=0.0)¶

Arrange N particles into a 3D lattice of density /rho. Redfines container volume as a cube with deduced volume, assumes unit mass adds uniform deviantion based on given maximum.

arg N:(int) number of particles.
arg rho:(float) /rho, required density.
arg dev:(float) maximum possible random deviation from lattice.
reset(state_input)¶

Applies initial lattice to particle positions.

Arg :(state.*) object of state class. Inheritered from BaseMDState.
class state.PosInitTwoParticlesInABox(rx, extent=array([ 1., 1., 1.]))¶

Creates two particles a set distance apart on the x-axis, centred on the origin. Places these within a containing volume of given extents.

Parameters:
  • rx – (float) Distance between particles.
  • extents – (np.array(3)) Extent for containing volume.
reset(state_input)¶

Resets the first two particles in the input state domain to sit on the x-axis the set distance apart.

Parameters:state_input – (state class) State object containing at least two particles.
class state.VelInitNormDist(mu=0.0, sig=1.0)¶

Initialise velocities by sampling from a gaussian distribution.

Parameters:
  • mu – (float) Mean for gaussian distribution.
  • sig – (float) Standard deviation for gaussian distribution.
reset(state_input)¶

Resets particle velocities to Gaussian distribution.

Parameters:state_input – (state class) Input state class oject containing velocities.
class state.VelInitTwoParticlesInABox(vx=array([ 0., 0., 0.]), vy=array([ 0., 0., 0.]))¶

Sets velocities for two particles.

Parameters:
  • vx – (np.array(3,1)) Velocity vector for particle 1.
  • vy – (np.array(3,1)) Velocity vector for particle 2.
reset(state_input)¶

Resets the particles in the input state to the required velocities.

Parameters:state_input – (state class) input state.
